summary: A website for trading Roblox accounts for Brainrot content.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Bold meme-style banner logo with the text 'Brainrot Trade Hub' in chunky neon letters on a dark background with pixel/glitch art accents (banner-logo.dim_1200x300.png)
- Small cartoon brain character icon with sunglasses, vibrant colors, meme aesthetic (brainrot-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that displays active trade listings, each showing a Roblox account offer (username, level, inventory highlights) in exchange for Brainrot content items or vice versa.

Add a 'Post a Trade' form on the frontend allowing users to submit a new listing by entering their display name, what they are offering (Roblox account info or Brainrot item description), and what they want in return.
Add a listing detail view where users can see the full details of a trade listing and mark it as closed/completed.

Apply a bold, energetic visual theme inspired by internet meme and gaming culture â€” bright accent colors (e.g., neon green or vivid orange), chunky typography, dark background, and card-based layout. Apply this style consistently across all pages and components.

new_feature_requests.summary: Roblox account trading platform where users can trade accounts for Brainrot content

Implement a backend data model and API for trade listings. Each listing must store: listing ID, poster display name, offered item type (Roblox account or Brainrot item), offered item description, requested item type, requested item description, status (open/closed), and creation timestamp.
